name: Shuyal Techniques
description: Overview of Shuyal tactics and techniques identified from the extended activities targeting 19 browser types with stealthy tactics for credential theft, data collection, and evasion.

techniques.comment: Shuyal steals credentials from web browsers' databases by executing SQL queries.
Clipboard data is captured to gather any sensitive information copied by the user.
System and browser data are collected, including browsing history and saved passwords.
Stolen data is compressed and encrypted before being sent via Telegram.
Shuyal automatically exfiltrates data using Telegram Bot API, bypassing controls.
Shuyal uses system commands and WMI queries to perform detailed system reconnaissance.
Shuyal likely uses software packing or obfuscation to evade antivirus detection.
Shuyal disables Windows Task Manager to prevent users from interrupting its processes.
The malware makes registry changes to disable Task Manager, ensuring it cannot be reactivated easily.
Shuyal establishes persistence by copying its executable into the Windows Startup folder.
By deleting itself and its traces after execution, Shuyal inhibits system recovery efforts.
Shuyal may use names mimicking legitimate software for its files to avoid detection.
